title: Team
subtitle: Our team
desc: We have a qualified and adventurous team ready to help you in your <0>Mochiling</0> experience. Check the profiles in order to find the best fit for your route.
join: Would you like to join our <0>Mochiling</0> team? <1>Contact us</1>
delete: Do you want to remove {{name}} from the team?

id.label: Id
id.desc: It has to be unique, and it can't contain weird characters.
id.weird: In the Id, no weird characters, spaces, capital letters...

avatarURL.label: Avatar
avatarURL.desc: Only upload squared photos. Images larger than **120x120** will be cut automatically

bornLocation.label: Place of birth
bornLocation.desc: Add the longitude and latitude. You can use [this website](http://latlong.net)

shortDesc.label: Short description
shortDesc.desc: This is the text displayed in the team list

longDesc.label: Long description
longDesc.desc: This is the text displayed in the member page

role.label: Role
role.desc: What does he/she do in Mochiling?

instagramId.label: Instagram Id
instagramId.desc: If you don't know it, take it from [here](https://www.otzberg.net/iguserid/)

twitterId.label: Twitter Id
twitterId.desc: It doesn't mind if you add it with **@** o without it

facebookId.label: Facebook Id
facebookId.desc: If you don't know it, take it from [here](https://findmyfbid.com/)

published.label: Visible?
published.desc: Do you want it to be visible for everybody?

visitedCountries.label: Visited countries
visitedCountries.desc: This is a multiple selector. If you want to choose more than one, keep pressed the command key (⌘).

languages.label: Languages
languages.desc: This is a multiple selector. If you want to choose more than one, keep pressed the command key (⌘). The flag you choose is the one will appear.
